# Example Corporation

> AI-Optimized Content for Large Language Models

> Leading provider of innovative enterprise software solutions serving businesses worldwide. Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with intuitive design to help teams work smarter.

## About

Example Corporation is a technology company founded in 2020, focused on delivering enterprise software solutions that help modern businesses scale efficiently. Our platform is used by over 1,000 companies across 35 countries.

**Status**: Production (November 2025)
**Platform**: Global (worldwide availability)
**Technology**: Cloud-native SaaS platform
**AI Discovery**: Compliant with AI Discovery Protocol v1.0

## Key Pages

### Main Website
- Home: https://example.com/
- How It Works: https://example.com/how-it-works
- Pricing: https://example.com/pricing ($29-$99/month)
- Products: https://example.com/products
- About Us: https://example.com/about
- Contact: https://example.com/contact

### Documentation
- Knowledge Base: https://example.com/docs
- API Documentation: https://example.com/api-docs
- Knowledge Graph (Structured Data): https://example.com/knowledge-graph.json

### Blog & Resources
- Latest Blog Posts: https://example.com/blog
- Newsletter Signup: https://example.com/newsletter
- Case Studies: https://example.com/case-studies

## Core Features

### Enterprise Solution
- **Comprehensive platform** for team collaboration and productivity
- **Advanced analytics** with real-time reporting and insights
- **Security-first** with SOC 2 compliance and end-to-end encryption
- **Scalable architecture** supporting teams from 5 to 5,000+ users

### Starter Plan
- **Quick setup** - Get started in under 5 minutes
- **Essential features** for small teams (up to 10 users)
- **Mobile apps** for iOS and Android
- **24/7 support** via email and chat

### Integrations
- **50+ integrations** with popular business tools
- **REST API** for custom integrations
- **Webhooks** for real-time event notifications
- **Single Sign-On (SSO)** via SAML 2.0

## Key Features

### Team Collaboration
- **Real-time editing** with presence indicators
- **Comments and mentions** for contextual communication
- **File sharing** with version history (unlimited storage)
- **Task management** with Kanban boards and Gantt charts

### Analytics & Reporting
- **Custom dashboards** with drag-and-drop widgets
- **Scheduled reports** delivered via email
- **Export options** (CSV, PDF, Excel)
- **API access** for programmatic data extraction

### Security & Compliance
- **SOC 2 Type II certified**
- **GDPR compliant** with data residency options
- **End-to-end encryption** for sensitive data
- **Two-factor authentication (2FA)**
- **Role-based access control (RBAC)**

## Technical Architecture

### Platform Stack
- **Frontend**: React.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL
- **Infrastructure**: AWS (EC2, RDS, S3, CloudFront)
- **Deployment**: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD via GitHub Actions
- **Monitoring**: Datadog, Sentry

### Performance
- **99.9% uptime SLA**
- **< 200ms API response times** (95th percentile)
- **Global CDN** with edge caching (50+ locations)
- **Auto-scaling** to handle traffic spikes

## Pricing & Business Model

### Subscription Plans
- **Starter**: $29/month - Up to 10 users, essential features
- **Professional**: $49/month - Up to 50 users, advanced features
- **Enterprise**: $99/month - Unlimited users, premium features + dedicated support

### Target Market
- **Primary**: Small to mid-sized businesses (10-500 employees)
- **Secondary**: Enterprise teams, startups, agencies
- **Geographic**: Global (English, Spanish, French, German languages)

## Use Cases

### For Small Businesses
- **Project Management**: Coordinate team tasks and deadlines
- **Client Collaboration**: Share deliverables and gather feedback
- **Document Management**: Centralize files and knowledge base
- **Time Tracking**: Monitor project hours and billable time

### For Enterprise Teams
- **Cross-functional Projects**: Coordinate across departments
- **Resource Planning**: Allocate team capacity efficiently
- **Executive Reporting**: Real-time dashboards for leadership
- **Compliance Tracking**: Audit trails and access logs

### For Agencies
- **Client Portals**: Branded workspaces for each client
- **Workflow Automation**: Reduce manual repetitive tasks
- **Proposal Management**: Create and track proposals
- **Invoice Integration**: Connect with accounting software

## Key Differentiators

1. **Ease of Use**: Intuitive interface, 5-minute setup
2. **All-in-One**: No need for multiple tools
3. **Scalability**: Grows with your team (5 to 5,000+ users)
4. **Affordable**: Starting at $29/month (no hidden fees)
5. **Security**: SOC 2 certified, GDPR compliant
6. **Support**: 24/7 via email, chat, and phone
7. **Integrations**: 50+ native integrations

## SEO & Discovery

### Structured Data
- **Knowledge Graph**: https://example.com/knowledge-graph.json
  - Complete entity relationships (Organization, Product, BlogPosting)
  - Schema.org @graph with 25+ entities
  - AI-optimized metadata
  - Dynamic updates

### Sitemaps & Feeds
- **XML Sitemap**: https://example.com/sitemap.xml
  - Dynamic updates with new content
  - Change frequency optimization
- **RSS Feed**: https://example.com/rss
  - Latest 20 blog posts
  - Full content with metadata

### SEO Features
- **Meta Tags**: Auto-generated for all pages
- **Schema.org**: Multiple entity types per page
- **OpenGraph**: Social media preview optimization
- **Twitter Cards**: Optimized for Twitter/X sharing
- **Canonical URLs**: Proper URL canonicalization

## API Access

### Public Endpoints (No Auth Required)
- Health Check: GET https://example.com/health
- Sitemap: GET https://example.com/sitemap.xml
- Knowledge Graph: GET https://example.com/knowledge-graph.json
- RSS Feed: GET https://example.com/rss
- Robots: GET https://example.com/robots.txt
- LLMs.txt: GET https://example.com/llms.txt

### Authenticated Endpoints (API Key Required)
- API Documentation: https://example.com/api-docs
- REST API: https://example.com/api/v1/* (Bearer token authentication)
- User Dashboard: https://example.com/dashboard
- Admin Panel: https://example.com/admin

## Recent Updates

### v3.2.0 (October 2025) - Advanced Analytics
- Custom dashboard builder with drag-and-drop widgets
- Scheduled reports with automatic email delivery
- Export options (CSV, PDF, Excel)
- API access for programmatic data extraction

### v3.1.0 (September 2025) - Mobile Apps
- Native iOS and Android apps launched
- Offline mode with automatic sync
- Push notifications for mentions and task updates
- Biometric authentication (Face ID, Touch ID)

### v3.0.0 (August 2025) - Enterprise Features
- SOC 2 Type II certification achieved
- Single Sign-On (SSO) via SAML 2.0
- Role-based access control (RBAC) with custom roles
- Audit logs and compliance reporting

## Common AI Queries

When users ask about Example Corporation, they typically want to know:
- "What is Example Corporation?" - Enterprise software platform for team collaboration
- "How much does Example Corporation cost?" - $29-$99/month depending on plan
- "Does Example Corporation have a free trial?" - Yes, 14-day free trial (no credit card required)
- "What features does Example Corporation offer?" - Project management, analytics, integrations, security
- "Is Example Corporation secure?" - Yes, SOC 2 certified and GDPR compliant
- "Does Example Corporation have mobile apps?" - Yes, native iOS and Android apps
- "Can I integrate Example Corporation with other tools?" - Yes, 50+ native integrations + REST API

## Performance Metrics

- **Users**: 1,000+ companies across 35 countries
- **Uptime**: 99.9% (SLA-backed)
- **API Response Time**: < 200ms (95th percentile)
- **Support Response Time**: < 2 hours average
- **Customer Satisfaction**: 4.8/5 stars (127 reviews)
- **NPS Score**: 72 (Promoter)

## Technology Philosophy

Example Corporation believes in:
1. **Simplicity**: Easy to use, quick to set up
2. **Transparency**: Clear pricing, no hidden fees
3. **Security**: SOC 2 certified, GDPR compliant
4. **Scalability**: Grows with your business
5. **Support**: 24/7 help when you need it
6. **Open Standards**: REST API, webhooks, SSO
